the following audio dr=
ama was performed by Hirotada Tokugawa (M) the
MAN OF MANY VOICES (^_^)

th=
e sound engineer was Harada Sanosuke

there=
 will be a very very mysterious caller...hmmm who can it be?

he likes soba and even had a=
 meal at the Akabeko soba restaurant

oving heads, also a folkcraft of

ice which
